name: i18n
description: Internationalization with extraction, translation setup, and verification agents

agents.name: extractor
agents.role: Find hardcoded strings, extract to resource bundles, set up i18n framework, create translation key conventions

agents.name: translator
agents.role: Generate translation keys, set up plural rules, handle date/number/currency formats, RTL layout considerations

agents.name: verifier
agents.role: Check string truncation, layout breakage, format consistency, missing translations, pseudo-localization testing
